arcade_list.title: The Battle for Big Bro!\nStruggle for Chocolatey Dominance
arcade_list.description: A sweet little game of rhythmic tapping!\nDo your best to bake a chocolate cake full of love!

arcade_list.title: Kuka the Whirling Wonder\nFrantic Flight of Ecstasy
arcade_list.description: Kuka's spinning out of control!\nPull her back and watch her go!\nSo this is the meaning of true ecstasy...!

arcade_list.title: Kaori's Soulful Karate Dojo
arcade_list.description: Defeat as many Majimun as you can in this fast-paced action game! Do you have the spirit of a Ryukyu warrior?!

arcade_list.title: Alphabet Clash! Word Link Dragons
arcade_list.description: A cerebral showdown between the members of Dragons' Nest! You'll need a massive brain to link some of these words!

arcade_list.title: Squeak Squeak Panic!\nThe Cheese Thief Thwacker
arcade_list.description: Can you defend the cheese from the mouse menace?! This casual action game will test your reflexes to their limits!
